SEARCH
Package com.project.RabbitRun.tile

Class TileManager

java.lang.Object
com.project.RabbitRun.tile.TileManager
public class TileManager extends Object
Manages tiles in the "Rabbit Run" game, including loading tile images, reading map data, and drawing tiles within the visible area of the game.

  • Field Details

    • tile

      public Tile[] tile
      Array to hold different types of tiles.

    • mapTileNum

      public int[][] mapTileNum
      2D array representing the tile map, where each element refers to a tile index.

    • map_path

      public String map_path
      map03 txt file

      map02 text file

      grass tile path

      public String tile2_path
      tree tile path

  • Constructor Details

    • TileManager

      public TileManager(GamePanel gamePanel)
      Main constructor for the tile manager. Initializes the tile array with a maximum of 10 tiles and sets the dimensions of the mapTileNum array based on the game's world size.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - the main game panel containing game settings and state

  • Method Details

    • choose_map

      public void choose_map(String path)
      simple function to choose the map
      Parameters:
      path - the path for the map file

    • getTileImage

      public void getTileImage()
      Loads tile images and sets their collision properties. Adds images to the tile array. Currently loads a grass tile and a tree tile.

    • loadMap

      public void loadMap(String path)
      Reads a map file and populates the mapTileNum array with tile indices. Each value in the file corresponds to a specific tile type.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the map file containing tile indices

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws tiles on the screen within the bounds of the player's visible area. Uses the mapTileNum array to determine which tiles to draw.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the Graphics2D context used for drawing
